name: One Way Out (Louis Vichy)
description:
Ever feel like learning some American Sign Language to have some secret prisoner's conversation with your friends? Now you can! Introducing One Way Out, an Infinite typing game that challenge you to learn sign language!

Either solo your way through waves of slime, or play with a friend who can help you maneuver through each level.

Type the name of the slime to kill it! (Backspace works btw)

# Bonus

MobMaker: Run this tool to draw the slime you would like to kill in the game! (Use the arrows keys to increase/decrease the canvas size!)

# Note

Please run `oalinst` or `oalinst.exe` to install OpenAL, an open source audio software used in the game. It is free and widely adopted by other indie game. We just don't have an installer for our game, so you will have to install it manually. The cool thing about this is you can put this anywhere, no need to install! You can check out the awesome OpenAL project here:

https://www.openal.org/

> Disclaimer: This is a school project.
